result.title: 2009 Defra MB0102 2B Distribution of Nematostella vectensis in the United Kingdom and Isle of Man
result.name: 2009-defra-mb0102-2b-distribution-of-nematostella-vectensis-in-the-united-kingdom-and-isle-of-m
result.notes:
This layer shows the distribution of the Starlet Sea Anemone, Nemastostella vectensis, a Biodiversity Action Plan, and Wildlife and Countryside Act Species. 
     This layer forms one of a set of data layers created for the Defra MB0102 contract.  This work will support the delivery of a network of Marine Protected Areas as required to meet existing international and national obligations and commitments, including Marine Conservation Zones (MCZs), a new measure to be delivered as part of the Marine and Coastal Access Bill, and equivalent measures under Scottish legislation.  The availability of these data layers will also be of importance in underpinning Marine Planning (e.g. licensing) in our marine area.

extras.value: ["Full resolution GIS layer only for viewing by MB0102 partners with publicly available layers available at 10km resolution."]

Full resolution data layer for use only within the MB0102 contract. Permission required from data originators for use in any other context, or by non MB0102 partners. 10km resolution data layer freely available under Open Government Licence.
Marine Environmental Data and Information Network (custodian); Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (DEFRA) (originator)

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
